Description: Rest onflight into Egypt, after Poussin: Holy Family resting in an Egyptian town, with three figures offering them water and fruits; donkey drinking at well on the right; in the background, a procession passing under a portico next to an obelisk. 1658/1667 Etching and engraving
Curator's comments: The original painting was commissioned by Mrs de Montmort in 1655; Poussin was only able to send the painting in 1658. The Bibliothèque Nationale keeps a copy of the plate, annotated by Pierre Mariette with the date 1667. The plate was therefore executed between these two dates.
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (2)
Andresen 1863 / Nicolaus Poussin - Verzeichniss der nach seinen Gemälden Gefertigten... (157)

Acquisition name: Donated by: Nan Ino Cooper, Baroness Lucas of Crudwell and Lady Dingwall
In Memory of: Auberon Thomas Herbert, 9th Baron Lucas of Crudwell and 5th Lord Dingwall
